CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 3, 1955, pg. 12, reads: "Shower for Bride-Elect - Members of her Club 21 showered bride-elect Lyda Jo Boswell last Saturday night, Aug. 27, at her home.  Miss Boswell will marry 'Jim' Tucker, the famous basketball star of Duquesne University, this Saturday evening at Warren Church.  Pictured are, center, honoree Lyda Jo Boswell; seated front, Cecelia Trower, Patricia Miller.  Second row: Jeannine Henry, Vicki Thorne, Jeannette Terry, Shirley Parker.  Standing: Sherlynn Dudley, Bettye Love, Gwendolyn Poinsette, Charlotte Ann Carter and Patricia Lightfoot."
TitMainTitle: Members of Club 21 gathered for wedding shower of Lyda Jo Boswell and Jim Tucker, first row from left: Cecelia Trower (Epperson), Lyda Jo Boswell, Patricia Miller; second row: Jeannine Henry, Vicki Thorne, Jeannette Terry, Shirley Parker; third row: Sherlynn Dudley, Bettye Love, Gwendolyn Poinsette, Charlotte Ann Carter, and Patricia Lightfoot
